title: Elvis Costello - Brutal Youth
description:
why should not old men be mad
i have known a likely lad
that had a sound flyfisher&#039;s wrist
turn to a drunken journalist
a girl that knew all Dante once
lived to bear children to a dunce
a Helen of social welfare dream
climbed on that wagonette to scream
young men know nothing of that sort
observant old men know it well
and when they know what old books tell
and that no better can be had
know why an old man should be mad

The above poem is from one of my favourite CD&#039;s:

"Some poems on the theme of madness and verses written by the insane".

I have a top copy of it.   If you&#039;d like me to upload it for you,
then please post a comment and request it.   If enough of you were 
to download it,then it could go platinum. 

By the way, what I have just uploaded really is a genuine copy of
an Elvis Costello album.
